item.name: normal
item.description:
1. create department "fpga"
2. create employee "zhangwei"
3. create billType "taxi"
4. create bill wiht title="work_taxi", amount=10, billType="taxi", remibuser="zhangwei"
5. check the new created recorder's field name are correct
